title: Đậu Phụ Sốt Cà Chua (Tofu in Tomato Sauce)
content:
Ingredients:
- 300g spaghetti
- 4 cloves garlic
- 60ml extra virgin olive oil

Instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water according to package directions until al dente. Reserve about 1/2 cup of pasta water before draining.
2. While pasta cooks, thinly slice the garlic. Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-low heat. Add the sliced garlic and cook gently until fragrant and lightly golden, being careful not to burn it.
3. Add the drained spaghetti to the pan with the garlic and oil. Toss well, adding a splash of reserved pasta water if needed to create a light sauce. Season with salt and black pepper to taste and serve immediately.
